attributes.action: reverse the decision made against the gurkhas
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The gurkhas are a very proud people & have served Britain over 300 years to be treated like this is a disgrace.This goverment will let anyone into this country but refuse the gurkhas.It is all about money it may cost & it should. Their pentions should be the same as the british army.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
